feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: At sight of these well-known features, seemingly improved with new celestial graces, the youth became a statue, expressing amazement, love, and awful adoration.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: He poured forth the dictates of his gratitude to the preservers of his happiness.

causedBy.name: Learning about the plan to reunite with Monimia

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: He sealed the assent which she had smiled, with a kiss imprinted on her polished forehead.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: These are the joys which virtue calls her own.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: begged leave to retire, that she might by repose recruit her exhausted spirits.

Places.description: Where Renaldo expressed gratitude to the preservers of his happiness

Places.name: Church vestry
Places.description: Where Renaldo expressed affection towards Monimia

Places.name: Church vestry
Places.description: Where Monimia experienced joy from reuniting with Renaldo

Places.name: Madam Clement's house
Places.description: Where Monimia sought relief by retiring to rest
